meta.title: Add Checkout Billing Address - Checkout Billing Address - Checkouts - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
Adds a billing address to an existing Checkout.

Required Fields

email

country_code

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more inf...

blocks.data:
Adds a billing address to an existing *Checkout*.

**Required Fields**
* email
* country_code

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Checkouts | modify | `store_checkout` |
|  Checkouts | read-only | `store_checkout_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

## Request Body

Either email or countryCode is required.

custom_fields.description: You can retreive custom fields from the [Get Form Fields](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-reference/storefront/form-fields/form-fields/getformfields) endpoint.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

id.description: Cart ID, provided after creating a cart with a POST.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to which the cart belongs.

email.description: The cart's email. This is the same email that is used in the billing address.

base_amount.description: Sum of cart line-item amounts before cart-level discounts, coupons, or taxes.

cart_amount_inc_tax.description: Sum of cart line-item amounts minus cart-level discounts and coupons including tax

cart_amount_ex_tax.description: Sum of cart line-item amounts minus cart-level discounts and coupons excluding tax

coupon_type.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discounted_amount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.
The discounted amount applied within a given context.
The discounted amount applied within a given context.

coupons.description: When the line item uses a coupon, returns a number indicating the total discounted amount.  Otherwise, returns an empty array.

discount_amount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item.

coupon_amount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

list_price.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

sale_price.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extended_list_price.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extended_sale_price.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

discounted_amount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

coupons.description: When the line item uses a coupon, returns a number indicating the total discounted amount.  Otherwise, returns an empty array.

discount_amount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item.

coupon_amount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

list_price.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

sale_price.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extended_list_price.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extended_sale_price.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

amount.description: Value must be between 1.00 and 1,000.00 in the store's default currency.

name.description: GiftCertificate-provided name that will appear in the control panel.

created_time.description: Time when the cart was created.

updated_time.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

items.title: Consignment
items.description: This allows us to have multiple shipping addresses. Where there is only one shipping address, this array will contain only one value, with all the items.

field_value.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

available_shipping_options.description: This is available only when "include=available_shipping_options" is presented in the URL.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transit_time.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

additional_description.description: ReadOnly, Field used for Shipping Provider API.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transit_time.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

additional_description.description: ReadOnly, Field used for Shipping Provider API.

coupon_discounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through coupons

code.description: Coupon code that applied this discount

discounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through cart level discounts

id.description: Discount rule ID that applied this discount

shipping_cost_inc_tax.description: The shipping cost for this consignment including tax.

shipping_cost_ex_tax.description: The shipping cost for this consignment excluding tax.

handling_cost_inc_tax.description: The handling cost of shipping for this consignment including tax.

handling_cost_ex_tax.description: The handling cost of shipping for this consignment excluding tax.

discounted_amount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

shipping_cost_total_inc_tax.description: Shipping cost before any discounts are applied including tax.

shipping_cost_total_ex_tax.description: Shipping cost before any discounts are applied excluding tax.

handling_cost_total_inc_tax.description: Handling cost for all consignments including tax.

handling_cost_total_ex_tax.description: Handling cost for all consignments excluding tax.

subtotal_inc_tax.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts including tax.

subtotal_ex_tax.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts excluding tax.

grand_total.description: The total payable amount, before applying any store credit or gift certificate.

created_time.description: Time when the cart was created.

updated_time.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

customer_message.description: Shopper's message provided as details for the order to be created from this checkout.

page.description: An array of the locations where the banner will display
